description:
Rock ‘til they stride, stride ‘til they ride. A functional alternative to the rocking horse, Strider’s rocking bike is just the thing for the littlest ones that just can’t wait to get riding (or maybe you can’t wait to get them riding). Once they’re ready to roll, simply pop the Sport 12 bike off the rocking base and they’re free. Push bikes help little riders get used to the balance and movement of riding, encouraging speedy learning, and making the transition to a pedal bike much smoother.

  • Gets little ones familiar on a bike
  • Rocking helps develop core strength
  • Sport 12 has a durable steel frame is still lightweight
  • EVA polymer tires require no maintenance
  • Soft padded seat keeps little bums happy
  • Rocking bas is suited for ages 6-18 months
  • Bike is suited for ages 18 months to 5 years – with an inseam of 30-51cm (12-20in.)
  • Max rider weight of 18kg (40lbs)
  • Strider axles bolt securely into rocking base
  • Seat height adjusts from 28–48cm
  • Padded handlebar height adjusts from 46–56cm
name: Strider 12 Sport 2-in-1 Rocking Bike - Infants to Children
